thread.title: ‘Sherlock’ Creator Mark Gatiss Admits We May Have Seen The Last Of The Show
thread.title_full: ‘Sherlock’ Creator Mark Gatiss Admits We May Have Seen The Last Of The Show

author: Rachel McGrath
title: ‘Sherlock’ Creator Mark Gatiss Admits We May Have Seen The Last Of The Show
text:
‘Sherlock’ Creator Mark Gatiss Admits We May Have Seen The Last Of The Show Noooo! Rachel McGrath Entertainment Reporter 
‘Sherlock’ creator Mark Gatiss has got some bad news for fans of the show, as he’s admitted that there might not be any more episodes of the programme. 
The ‘Sherlock’ cast and crew have previously been very noncommittal when asked about when they’ll be working together again , and the showrunner has how revealed that he can’t guarantee more episodes will be made. David M. Benett via Getty Images Mark also plays Mycroft in the series
